main_definition: HTTP stands for Hypertext Transfer Protocol, which is the foundation of data communication in the World Wide Web.

meanings_and_examples.example: The HTTP protocol governs how messages are exchanged over the web.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A request method supported by the HTTP protocol used to retrieve data from a specified resource
meanings_and_examples.example: When you enter a URL in your browser, it sends an HTTP GET request to the server for that page's content.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abbreviation sometimes used informally to refer to the web or World Wide Web
meanings_and_examples.example: I found some information online; let me check the http and see what I can find.
